name: Glow and Sculpt Face Serum Primer with Niacinamide
about: What it is:  A hydrating priming serum with a facial roller to sculpt your face and leave a healthy, radiant glow...Finish: Radiant..Skin Type: Normal, Oily, Dry, and Combination..Concerns: Dryness and Redness..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Niacinamide: Helps to visibly brighten skin and reduce the appearance of redness and blemishes..- Glycerin: Helps to leave the skin feeling hydrated...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This primer is a skincare and makeup-prep hybrid product that helps your makeup last longer. The nonstick, lightweight formula leaves the skin feeling hydrated and helps to reduce the look of redness. The roller applicator helps to reduce puffiness and allows you to add visible definition to your jawline and cheekbones.
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Helps to visibly brighten skin and reduce the appearance of redness and blemishes..-Glycerin: Helps to leave the skin feeling hydrated...Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Methylpropanediol, Panthenol, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glucose, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Fructooligosaccharides, Fructose, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Yeast Ferment Extract, Tromethamine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phytate, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For best results, apply after moisturizing and before applying makeup. .-Gently squeeze the tube so the formula comes out onto the roller applicator. .-Massage the roller over the skin, working outward toward the edges of the face..-For hygiene reasons, REFY recommends wiping the roller after every use. .-For best results, store the product at room temperature and do not refrigerate. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the roller head. .-Cut along the top of the tube and rinse to ensure there is no product left. .-The tube and lid can both be recycled in your home recycling bin. .-The roller is made of PE and TPE and should be recyclable at your local recycling bank.

reviews.review_text: I've used this Refy primer for a year now and finally finished the bottle. I think this primer is very hydrating and provides a nice glow to the skin. It has a slightly tacky finish making it perfect for your foundation to stick to.   As for makeup longevity, I think it does its job well and keeps my base looking fresh for 7-8 hours.   Keep in mind that this is a water-based primer, so it worked with some foundations, but not others (works with some silicone foundations too). It might be worth to get a sample to test with your current foundation. For example, I use the Armani Luminous Silk and it goes together perfectly despite the Armani having silicones in it. However, it did not work well with my Nars soft matte and caused a lot of pilling. I found that it worked perfectly with all of my water-based foundations like Rare Beauty and Kosas.  I love that it has niacinamide in it and I honestly really like the roller, even if it's a bit gimmicky. I will definitely repurchase :)

reviews.review_title: Overall A Skip - There Are Better Products!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I have nothing positive to say about this product, and I was very excited to try it.   One, if you have skin that is acne-prone, particularly bacterial acne, I do not recommend. The applicator is pushed directly into the face with little other option and can't be cleaned very properly. Additionally, I can't say for sure, but I do have sensitive skin, and did experience some irritation and breakouts in areas that I normally wouldn't after using this product. I tried a few times and experienced this after each time.   Two, I COULD NOT get this product to properly dry down / get tacky for the rest of my base to adhere properly or stay on my skin. Like, laughably so. Every time I lightly touched my face, my foundation or concealer would just wipe off on my finger tip, even with setting spray, trying to dry down with my mini fan without applying anything else for a period of time.. It most likely has something to do with the base being water vs silicone.. but if you are looking for ease in your routine overall I would skip this. Not worth the hassle.   I use the MILK Hydro Grip Primer with few complaints & will continue to stick with that. If that's a product you like, I don't think this is something you will find comparable.

reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this based on seeing so many influencers on YouTube and TikTok rave about this product. However, at the end of the day, the applicator is more gimmicky than expected, and the product doesn’t really sculpt either. It’s just a dewy primer. It’s ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have used this primer a handful of times and I don’t love it. When I take the cap off the entire top piece with the roller also comes off and it’s quite challenging to put back on. The primer also doesn’t come out in aan equal way so airs not spread out evenly on the face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never buy expensive primers but I really wanted to try this one because of the applicator. When I tried the formula on my hand at Sephora, it felt super moisturizing and I knew I had to buy it. I absolutely love the applicator. It feels so good on the skin. However, the product itself doesn't really do anything for me. I don't really see a lot of glow and it feels moisturizing at first, but dries down fast and feels not as moisturizing. For the price, I would never repurchase this product. I expected a lot better from this product and was honestly disappointed. I feel like this could have been so good because I love the applicator but the product is meh.

I sweat a lot and my makeup stayed on really nicely after using this! I’d recommend squeezing lightly at first and adding more if you need it. Got one for my mom too who is now equally obsessed. 10/10!
